packages.name: Goa Beach Bliss
packages.desc:
Enjoy the sun, sand, and sea at Goa's beautiful beaches. Perfect for families and couples.

packages.desc: Explore the wild in Ranthambore National Park. Spot tigers and other wildlife in their natural habitat.

packages.desc: Trek through the majestic Himalayas and experience breathtaking mountain views.

packages.desc: Discover Europe's iconic cities, rich culture, and historic landmarks in 14 days.

packages.name: Kerala Backwaters
packages.desc: Relax on a houseboat and enjoy the serene backwaters of Kerala.

packages.name: Andaman Scuba Diving
packages.desc: Dive into the crystal-clear waters of Andaman and explore vibrant marine life.

packages.desc: Explore the royal palaces, forts, and colorful bazaars of Jaipur.
